name: Michael GRIMALDI, sui juris, injured party v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PHILADELPHIA COUNTY COURT OF COMMON PLEAS v. Michael Grimaldi, ens legis defendant, Corporate Fiction. Petition of Michael Grimaldi
name_abbreviation: Grimaldi v. Commonwealth, Philadelphia County Court of Common Pleas

parties: Michael GRIMALDI, sui juris, injured party v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PHILADELPHIA COUNTY COURT OF COMMON PLEAS v. Michael Grimaldi, ens legis defendant, Corporate Fiction. Petition of Michael Grimaldi.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 28th day of December, 2010, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
10 A.3d 901
Michael GRIMALDI, sui juris, injured party v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PHILADELPHIA COUNTY COURT OF COMMON PLEAS v. Michael Grimaldi, ens legis defendant, Corporate Fiction. Petition of Michael Grimaldi.
No. 128 EM 2010.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 28, 2010.
